mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.code from ad_basic_type a where a.type = 3

select b.id, b.name, b.code, b.sort, fg.floor_id floorId from ad_user u INNER JOIN ad_floor_group fg on u.group_num = fg.group_id INNER JOIN ad_basic_type b on fg.floor_id = b.id where b.type=3 and b.state=1 and u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY sort
